cartridgeinfo.name: Apply Chronos Stereotypes
cartridgeinfo.description:
Applies the following Chronos Stereotypes:
* ChiBusinessUseCase to all uml::UseCase * ChiNode to all uml::Class * ChiBusinessPartner to all uml::Actor
Additionally, all Comments are linked correctly to their containers (fixing errors of EAexporter).
Adds a ChiRequirement and ChiFeature for each UseCase.
